SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE emailbccaccountcategory SET Name=@@Name@@,LastTime=NOW() WHERE ID=@@ID@@; UPDATE emailbccaccount SET EmailBccAccountCategoryName=@@Name@@,EmailBccAccountLastTime=NOW() WHERE EmailBccAccountCategoryID=@@ID@@;

DELETE FROM emailbccaccountcategory WHERE ID=@@ID@@; UPDATE emailbccaccount SET EmailBccAccountCategoryID=-1,EmailBccAccountCategoryName='',EmailBccAccountLastTime=NOW() WHERE EmailBccAccountCategoryID=@@ID@@;
SELECT ebac.ID,ebac.Name,ebac.CreateTime,ebac.LastTime FROM emailbccaccountcategory AS ebac WHERE ebac.ID=@@ID@@;
SELECT ebac.ID,ebac.Name,ebac.CreateTime,ebac.LastTime FROM emailbccaccountcategory AS ebac WHERE ebac.Name=@@Name@@;

SELECT ebac.ID,ebac.Name,ebac.CreateTime,ebac.LastTime FROM emailbccaccountcategory AS ebac WHERE 1=1 <R%= AND ebac.Name LIKE '%@@Name@@%'%R> ORDER BY ebac.ID LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM emailbccaccountcategory AS ebac WHERE 1=1 <R%= AND ebac.Name LIKE '%@@Name@@%'%R>;
SELECT ebac.ID,ebac.Name,ebac.CreateTime,ebac.LastTime FROM emailbccaccountcategory AS ebac ORDER BY ebac.ID;
SELECT ebac.ID,ebac.Name,ebac.CreateTime,ebac.LastTime FROM emailbccaccountcategory AS ebac <R%= WHERE ebac.Name LIKE '%@@Name@@%'%R>;
